data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Ciudad de Buenos Aires.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ciudad de Buenos Aires, Argentina
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Ciudad de Buenos Aires, Argentina from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 306,842 believers in Ciudad de Buenos Aires, Argentina a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Ciudad de Buenos Aires, Argentina to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Turk people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Ciudad de Buenos Aires that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Ciudad de Buenos Aires, Argentina to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Ciudad de Buenos Aires a passion to plant another simple church.
